meanings.definition: Including or encompassing everything or everyone.
meanings.sent1: The inclusive playground had swings for all children to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The inclusive policy welcomed people of all backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The inclusive picnic had snacks for everyone, even the picky eaters.
meanings.sent4: Her inclusive leadership style made everyone feel valued and heard.
meanings.sent5: The inclusive community event brought together people from all walks of life.

meanings.definition: Allowing or covering all items or elements.
meanings.sent1: The inclusive package included all the necessary tools for the project.
meanings.sent2: The inclusive insurance plan covered all possible damages.
meanings.sent3: The inclusive buffet had options for every taste bud, even the pickiest eaters.
meanings.sent4: Her inclusive teaching method ensured that every student understood the lesson.
meanings.sent5: The inclusive membership gave access to all areas of the club.
